titleStmt.title: The sinfull mans search: or seeking of God. Preached by Henrie Smith, and published according to a true corrected copie, sent by the author to an honorable ladie
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Scarlet] for Cuthbert Burby,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; part 2 formerly STC 22682.
Part 2, "Maries choise", identified as STC 22682 on UMI microfilm, reel 1465.
"Maries choise" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
